meanings.definition: A type of instrumental composition in the style of a fugue.
meanings.sent1: The music student studied a ricercari for their music theory class.
meanings.sent2: The orchestra performed a beautiful ricercari at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The ricercari played by the pianist made everyone in the audience tap their feet.
meanings.sent4: The ricercari of emotions in the music touched the hearts of all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The intricate ricercari painted a vivid picture of musical complexity.
